ch0148_10_matsuba/0101_0701_01_10:
Are you ready for an adventure
today, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0148_10_matsuba/0101_0701_02_10:
All of your experiences make you stronger! Be sure
to enjoy them!
ch0148_10_matsuba/7101_0701_01_10:
Have you observed your partner Pokémon closely?
Do you know what it’s good at and what its
weaknesses are?
ch0148_10_matsuba/7101_0701_02_10:
It’s important to observe things with your
heart and mind as well as with your eyes.
ch0148_10_matsuba/7102_0701_01_10:
This sygna suit’s design was inspired by my
Ho-Oh. Do you think it suits me?
ch0148_10_matsuba/7102_0701_02_10:
I hope it does. It makes me feel even closer to the
Legendary Pokémon I’ve admired for so long.
ch0148_10_matsuba/7103_0701_01_10:
Do you know about the three Pokémon that lost
their lives in the Ecruteak fire?
ch0148_10_matsuba/7103_0701_02_10:
It’s said that Ho-Oh granted new life to all three
of them.
ch0148_10_matsuba/7103_0701_03_10:
It’s kind of amazing that a Ghost-type user like me
would become partners with a Pokémon like that!
ch0148_10_matsuba/7104_0701_01_10:
You’re wondering if I ever feel overwhelmed by
all the training I’m constantly doing? Well...
ch0148_10_matsuba/7104_0701_02_10:
I get back just as much as I put in. So when I
think of it that way, it’s really not too bad.
ch0148_10_matsuba/7104_0701_03_10:
Putting in the effort is always worth it!
I guarantee it.
ch0148_10_matsuba/7105_0701_01_10:
Becoming partners with Ho-Oh still feels
like a dream!
ch0148_10_matsuba/7105_0701_02_10:
I just can’t wait to test out how far I can go
together with this Legendary Pokémon!
ch0148_10_matsuba/7105_0701_03_10:
I’m sure if I’m with you, I can reach even loftier
heights, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0148_10_matsuba/1701_0701_01_10:
I’ve got something I want to give you. Be sure to
put it to good use!
ch0148_10_matsuba/1701_0702_01_10:
You want to give me something in return? No, no,
that’s not necessary.
ch0148_10_matsuba/1701_0702_02_10:
I’m happy just watching the growth of such
a promising sync pair.
ch0148_10_matsuba/2501_0701_01_10:
Have you noticed that lots of Gym Leaders tend to
stick to and master a single type?
ch0148_10_matsuba/2501_0701_02_10:
I, for one, have a connection with Ghost-type
Pokémon that’s absolutely unrivaled! But you
know what?
ch0148_10_matsuba/2501_0701_03_10:
While partnering with a different type may be
difficult, it’s also fascinating!
ch0148_10_matsuba/2501_0702_01_10:
Each time I take on a new challenge, my
future expands!
ch0148_10_matsuba/2501_0702_02_10:
And of course, I can’t stop my journey as a
Gym Leader, either!
ch0148_10_matsuba/2511_0701_01_10:
My friend Eusine has been chasing after the
Legendary Pokémon Suicune for ages now.
ch0148_10_matsuba/2511_0701_02_10:
He never gives up no matter what, and seeing
that has really motivated me.
ch0148_10_matsuba/2511_0701_03_10:
There’s no question that I was able to achieve my
dream thanks to his influence.
ch0148_10_matsuba/2511_0701_04_10: I’ll have to properly thank Eusine someday.
ch0148_10_matsuba/2511_0702_01_10: You still have dreams you’re striving for, right?
ch0148_10_matsuba/2511_0702_02_10:
If those dreams ever come true, remember to think
back on all the people who supported you and
cheered you on.
ch0148_10_matsuba/2511_0702_03_10: It’s important to show your gratitude to them.
ch0148_10_matsuba/3001_0701_01_10:
The sparkling hues of a morning sunrise sure are
breathtaking, aren’t they.
ch0148_10_matsuba/3003_0701_01_10:
I think being on Pasio will allow me to discover
new ways to train that weren’t possible in Johto!
ch0148_10_matsuba/3005_0701_01_10:
When you train, you have to pace yourself so
you’re not tired the next day. That’s the key to
keeping to a tough training schedule.
